articles.content: City dominated much of an entertaining encounter on a miserable evening but looked set to miss out on the chance to take over at the summit until Silva struck 11 minutes from time, albeit in contenti… [+4373 chars]

articles.title: Paulina bares all: Her embarrassing nip slip, marriage and challenging childhood - NEWS.com.au

articles.content: Paulina Gretzky, the daughter of the greatest ice hockey player ever and partner of golfs number one player, has opened up on life in the spotlight.She says she had the “best life ever” growing up as… [+2282 chars]
